amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer funds from the mines and miners, fossil energy research and development, and naval petroleum and oil shale reserves accounts in order to provide $81.3 million for Indian education.
amendment.purpose: An amendment that cuts $80 million from the Bureau of Mines, Alternative Fuels Production, and the Naval Petroleum Reserve Accounts and adds that amount to the Office of Indian Education.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 143 - 282 (Roll no. 501).
